title: After a Decade of React, Is Frontend a Post-React World Now?
author: Richard MacManus
description: Ten years after an influential React presentation at Oscon 2014, we revisit the concepts behind React and see how well they apply to 2024.
cntitle: React 诞生十年后，前端是否已进入后 React 时代？
cndescription: 在 2014 年 Oscon 大会上 React 发表了一场有影响力的演讲，十年后，我们重新审视 React 背后的概念，看看它们在 2024 年是否仍然适用。
